name: ThunderSounds
0:
”Alexa open thunder sounds”
”Alexa ask thunder sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: thunder sounds
des: Enhance sleep and focus with Thunder Sounds! Sleep comfortably while you listen to the raging thunder storm outside. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Thunder Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
